title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.25 - Employment recruitment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.25 - Employment recruitment

State Regulations

Faculty members and employees of educational institutions or
other organizations are prohibited from any recruitment activities which may
result in the offering of employment to students. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1107.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
